alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 11:54PM EDT until November 01 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of potentially high snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour, gusty winds, and the first accumulating snowfall of the season will result in a period of hazardous travel conditions tonight. The highest amounts are expected several miles inland from the lakeshore.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
